Title: 37295 - # Ways Cloud-Based Software Can Help Your Business Thrive
Direction: 675 words. Write a list of four to eight ways that cloud-based software can help businesses (particularly small businesses) improve sales without spending too much money. You may want to mention benefits such as easy remote access, scalability, and lower costs. The resource links offer plenty of ideas you could mention in the article. Make sure you include the client link and keyword in a section that highlights one of Sage's benefits. Write for an audience interested in accounting, finance, sales, marketing and technology.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: online invoicing with Sage One
